title: spoofing techniques
extract: Spoofing. The word "spoof" means to hoax, trick, or deceive. Therefore, in the IT world, spoofing refers tricking or deceiving computer systems or other computer users. ... Spoofing can take place on the Internet in several different ways. One common method is through e-mail.Nov 13, 2007
extract_html: Spoofing. The word "spoof" means to hoax, trick, or deceive. Therefore, in the IT world, spoofing refers tricking or deceiving computer systems or other computer users. ... Spoofing can take place on the Internet in several different ways. One common method is through e-mail.Nov 13, 2007
